structuralFindings.rationale: Based on existing specimen classification. New observations from earnings/research session.
structuralFindings.aiTeamStructure: In October 2025, Chegg cut 45% of its workforce, citing the 'new realities of AI' plus reduced Google traffic. This is one of the most dramatic AI-attributed workforce reductions in percentage terms.

sources.name: Chegg cuts 45% of workforce citing 'new realities of AI'
sources.notes: Chegg cuts 45% of workforce citing 'new realities of AI'

summary: Chegg cuts 45% of workforce citing 'new realities of AI': In October 2025, Chegg cut 45% of its workforce, citing the 'new realities of AI' plus reduced Google traffic. This is one of the most dramatic AI-attributed workforce reductions in percentage terms.
